advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Memorize and collect matching Instagram photos.

** Featured in "New & Noteworthy" in more than 100 countries **

"My children love it!" -- José, Cosmonaut Games

"We played Instamory during a camping trip and we couldn’t have had more fun." -- Drew Olanoff, TheNextWeb

"This is by far the most clever use of Instagram." -- Sean Capelle, AppAdvice


== GAME DESCRIPTION ==

Instamory is a beautifully designed iPad version of the classic concentration game in which up to 4 players memorize and collect matching Instagram photos. 

Thanks to more than 150M photos in Instagram's database, this game never gets old. Every day a new card set to discover. Just type in what you would like to play: dogs, cats, cars, flowers, ladybug, cake, kids, classiccars, ... You name it!

No Instagram Account required to play the game.


== FEATURES ==

* Clean and simple UI that puts all emphasis on your photos

* 1-4 players on a single iPad

* Play with your own Instagram photos, or choose from millions of public ones

* Play instantly with a random set, or take your time to individually configure a set

* Search for particular photos by tag

* Featured Instagram sets specifically designed for Instamory

* Browse, discover, and "like" Instagram photos directly from within the app


== Notes ==
- Internet connection required to play the game
- This product uses the Instagram API but is not endorsed or certified by Instagram
- In order to use the "My Photos" feature of Instamory, you need an Instagram account. Search for Instagram by Burbn, Inc, on the app store. It's for free.
